name: Super Dude Bros
description:
Super dude bros is a physics-based platform game about a dude who goes on an adventure. Presumably to save the world. Unfortunately, he had a bit too many beers before going.

Overcome the challenges of gravity as you stumble around 9 levels. This new version for itch.io also has gamepad support!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys or thumbstick on gamepad to move
  • up or "A" on the gamepad to jump
  • Space or "X" on the gamepad to shoot
  • The R key or "B" on the gamepad to restart the level. (In case you can't get up)
